documentation.text:
@title EmergencyMode
 @dev Government-activated emergency controller; PaymentRouter can consult this to waive fees
@dev Payment record structure kept minimal for gas; frontends pull full detail from events

@notice Toggle global emergency mode (admin-only)
 @dev In emergencies, fees are waived to support crisis payments
@notice Update the flat ETH fee (admin-only). Ignored while emergencyActive.

@notice Return a user's last up to HISTORY_SIZE payment hashes
 @dev Frontends typically index events; this is a lightweight on-chain glimpse

@title SavingsCircles
 @dev Minimal ROSCA implementation for rotating payouts using an ERC-20 token

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct SavingsCircles.Circle storage pointer,address) view returns (bool)

documentation.text:
@title SocialReputation
 @dev On-chain reputation scoring and simple micro-loans backed by a token pool
